title: unakkum enakkum
sahitya:
unakkum enakkum enna poruttamayyA un pOl kaiyilum cakram shuzhaludu pAr


anupallavi

  tanakku nigharillAda jagannAthA undanakkaDimai AnEn paNDarinAthA


caraNam    ANDa carAcaramaDukkaDukkAi shamaippAi arai noDiyil maN pANDam
 aDukkaDukkAi shamaippEn toNDar panIya bala nAma rUpam eDuppAi unadaDi
 bhajikka nAn kOTi pirappeDuppEn jE jE viTThala jE jE viTThala
